posts.post_title: VG/VGEX cards with backs stamps for sale
posts.post_content:
Shipping is $3 within the U.S.

I haven't seen the William Baily stamp before.  Pretty sweet.  The other two stamps I have seen around a few times.  All 3 cards are in great shape.

McCormick $46
Bergen $26
